statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git'); k8s=$(kubectl config current-context 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-k8s'); echo "\033[36m$cwd\033[0m \033[90m::\033[0m \033[32m$branch\033[0m \033[90m::\033[0m \033[33m$k8s\033[0m"
